Text: Thank u for the upload, but could we possibly get this in xvidinstead of eight different uploads of x264.  I only ask cause I'm homeless with a cheap android phone and it won't handle the audio formats used with x264.  Thank you.

Great upload as always. Im ALWAYS coming to you for the shows I watch. Is there any way you could upload the Robot Combat League show that aired on scyfy last night? only one person has it uploaded but no seeders. I know there would be tons of seeders if you did it cause everyone loves your uploads. Thanks. :)
Thanks for the ul!! You do, I believe, ROCK!

plan987: please don't confuse homelessness with pushing a shopping cart around. My kids and myself are also homeless. It simply means I don't have a permanent address. among other things. (lol, long live free wifi). People think that if you have a means to get online, you can sell it and somehow find a place to live. Well, good luck selling a 12 year old laptop to anyone that isn't pushing a shopping cart :/.

I can say that I truly appreciate kind souls like those at eztv, ettv, yify, aXXo, and many others. They make my kids and myself feel at home no matter where we are.

Posted from a Walmart parking lot ( I am not kidding)

I wish everyone all the best. My heart goes out to anyone in need of shelter. I've been barely keeping myself above water for years now & it's been very bad this last 2 years.

TV is our escape & Justified is a top notch show. Unique, funny, great writers & acting.

Who knew I'd love the South LOL
